name: Randuin's Omen
passive: Rock Solid: Reduce damage from critical strikes by 20%. When struck by an attack, slow the attacker's Attack Speed by 15% for 1.5 seconds.
active: Active: Slow nearby enemies by 55% for 2 seconds (60 second cooldown).
description: Item that provides Armor, Health. Passive effect: Reduce damage from critical strikes by 20%. When struck by an attack, slow the attacker's Attack Speed by 15% for 1.5 seconds.. Active effect: Slow nearby enemies by 55% for 2 seconds (60 second cooldown).. Perfect for frontline champions who need to absorb damage.
tips: Provides excellent sustain in lane and during fights
The healing/lifesteal helps you stay in fights longer
Great for champions who take extended trades
Excellent for frontline champions who need to absorb damage
Build this when facing heavy physical damage compositions
